params.inputAmount: The amount of the input wrapped token to be redeemed for an underlying token.
params.inputToken: The input wrapped token to be redeemed for an underlying token.
params.strategyData: The ABI-encoded data to be used in the redemption strategy logic.

returns.outputAmount: The quantity of underlying tokens outputted.

redeem(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Redeems custom collateral `token` for an underlying token.
